pages.text: Beelzebub, first to Filth from and to the Pit, is the patron of $(l:besmirchment:creatures/werepyres)Werepyres$().$(br)They can be $(l:bewitchment:tools/grotesque_stew)Pledged$() to, allowing total control over the $(l:bewitchment:curses/conducting_curses)Curse$().$(br)You may also offer Beelzebub $(l:bewitchment:introduction/crops)Garlic Bread$(), clearing you from Werepyrism.$(br2)Summoning Beelzebub is rather elaborate, and will be outlined in this entry.
